summary: I changed the default guard armor for a cool draugr (with helm). It\'s really cool ... change the path of the game for some people like me =)
descriptionHtml:
I changed the default guard armor for a cool draugr (with helm). It\'s really cool ...  it\'s change the 

path of the game for some people like me =)


If you want the draugr armor without helm, just post : i want it !!! or something like that and ill 

check for it.


How to install : Put the files in your skyrim data folder.


How to uninstall : Delete those files : EncguardSons (...)


Note : If you kill the guards remember this : you can\'t wear their armor (draugr armor) it\'s an 

appearance.
author: me
